summary: A collection of logger implementations for PyTorch Lightning that abstract experiment tracking across multiple back‑ends (TensorBoard, CSV/YAML, Comet.ml, MLflow, Neptune, Weights & Biases). It defines a core logger interface, handles experiment creation, metric and hyperparameter recording, model graph and checkpoint artifact management, and supports both local and remote storage.
business_intent: Enable seamless, standardized logging and monitoring of deep‑learning training runs to improve reproducibility, debugging, and insight generation for data science and ML engineering teams.
